name: DREST
description:
Explore your high fashion skills by styling our life-like model avatars in the world’s leading fashion brands. Be inspired by our daily interactive fashion news feed then create your own unique looks with the new season collections. Dive into a world of pure escapism as you play challenges and follow our community of stylists.

How to play DREST...

Become a Super Stylist:
Create standout photoshoot images using our diverse cast of models, exclusive looks devised by renowned makeup artist Mary Greenwell, as well as dream locations from around the globe.

Share and Win:
Share your looks with the DREST community of stylists - and on your social channels - to gain fashion influence and win virtual and real-life rewards.

Get Mood Boarding:
Design enticing, beautiful mood boards with the new season’s hero pieces and accessories, as well as inspirational backgrounds, stickers and playful props.

Vote:
Critique your fellow stylists’ creations and take inspiration from their looks.

Endless Fashion Inspiration:
Discover the newest on trend in-season fashion pieces from the very best luxury and emerging contemporary brands of the world. Pull together your ultimate virtual wardrobe as you follow your favorite DREST stylists to see their latest looks, pieces and styling portfolio.

Shop!
If you see a piece you love and want to buy in real life, try it out on our size-inclusive DREST Fit Model avatars to make smart purchases that will make your real world wardrobe work harder for longer. Then shop the product directly and buy.

PLEASE NOTE

- DREST is a free to download experience-lifestyle game.

- The opportunity exists to pay real money in-app for some extra items and charges will appear on your account. Please buy carefully.

- A network connection is required to play.

- For information on how DREST collects your data, please read our privacy policy at www.drest.com/privacy

- If you have a problem while styling a photoshoot or mood board, please use DREST’s help feature.
